channel.title: 508 running problem
channel.description: ok when i click run all it come up with the system cannot find the specified the system cannot find the specified the system cannot find the specified the system cannot find the specified the system cannot find the specified and soo on how do i make it run properly and open then client

item.title: 508 running problem
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

Actually i think he clicked “All”, and thought it ran the server too.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 running problem
item.dc:creator: @Ramenryoko Ramenryoko
item.description:
@Ramenryoko wrote:

Open the run.bat. You’ll probably find direct paths, something like:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe"

or,

"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe"

Change all those to:

java

or,

javac

Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 running problem
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme2 trytohaxme2
item.description:
@trytohaxme2 wrote:

Try running the server before you open the client.

Read full topic
